A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars movies always seem to be fun ride and this too\, but also quite a thinly veiled feminist/SJW propaganda piece. When the actor himself\, Mark Hamill/Luke Skywalker\, is warning you repeatedly you're handling the character completely inconsistently with the past movies\, something is wrong..... unless you're on some sort of quest to push your social/political values\, rather than creating an enjoyable movie that brings people together.
